title: Kia EV9 Driver Found Asleep on California Freeway as Car Drove Itself
description: It might sound like something out of a science fiction flick, but it happened for real on a California freeway. CHP responded to reports of a Kia SUV cruising down U.S. 101 near San José, with the two occupants apparently fast asleep. Several concerned motorists attempted to get the pair’s ...
titleSummary: "Freeway Crash Raises Alarms Over Autonomous Vehicle's Ability to Handle Human Error"
descriptionSummary: A bizarre incident unfolded on a California highway when a Kia SUV was spotted drifting down U.S. Route 101 near San Jose with its occupants seemingly unconscious, prompting concern from other drivers who tried to rouse them.

title: Ram and Jeep Owners Say Birds Won’t Leave Their Trucks Alone
description: According to a new survey from Alan’s Factory Outlet, owners of Ram trucks and Jeep SUVs say they’re dealing with a very specific, and rather unpleasant problem: birds. The poll, which gathered responses from more than 3,000 vehicle owners across the U.S., found that Ram and ...
titleSummary: "Fowl Play: Flocking Birds Cause Commotion for Ram and Jeep Drivers"
descriptionSummary: A recent survey of over 3,000 US truck and SUV owners has uncovered an unexpected issue: fowl trouble. Specifically, many Ram and Jeep drivers are complaining about bird-related problems while on the road.

title: 1985 Corvette Z51 For Sale with 9,000 Miles: Vintage Corvette for the Price of a Used Civic
description: With circa 9,000 miles on the odometer, this particular 1985 Chevrolet Corvette Z51 is a lot of car for not a lot of money. Listed on Bring a Trailer, this could be your ticket to the affordable Corvette dream. It’s a private party sale, and the potential buyer gets access to the owner’s manual, ...
titleSummary: "Classic Muscle at a Fractional Cost: 1985 Corvette Z51 with 9k Original Miles"
descriptionSummary: This 1985 Chevrolet Corvette Z51 offers a thrilling blend of performance and affordability, with over 9,000 miles on the clock. A rare find at an attractive price point, it's now up for grabs on Bring a Trailer through a private sale, complete with owner's manual included.

title: Ford Recalls Another 1.5 Million Cars For Backup Cameras, But At Least You Get A 15-Year Warranty Now
description: As somebody who makes a living writing about the latest goings on in the automotive industry, this writer can never complain about having more content to cover. But even so, it's getting a little tiresome talking about Ford recalls every single week. It seems that even Ford has realized that things ...
titleSummary: "Ford's Bigger Recall: 1.5M Vehicles Called Back for Safety Fix, with a Twist"
descriptionSummary: The automotive beat is always buzzing with news, but for this journalist, the constant stream of Ford recall announcements is starting to feel like Groundhog Day - a never-ending cycle that's growing stale.

title: Toyota Camry GT-S Concept Shows What a Performance Camry Could Look Like
description: Possibly the only disappointing thing about the latest Toyota Camry is that there’s no sporty version, and Toyota has no plans to bring back a TRD model. The best you can do is get the Camry Nightshade with the 232-horsepower, all-wheel-drive powertrain, but even that is a few levels below the old ...

descriptionSummary: The new Toyota Camry falls short of excitement, particularly in its lack of a high-performance variant, leaving fans who miss the TRD model to settle for the sporty touches of the Nightshade trim instead.

title: This Corvette ZR1 Was So Hot on Track, It Melted Itself
description: While C8 Corvette owners have been dealing with issues related to fires that prompted a recall, they had nothing on John Anhalt when he attempted to break the speed record at the Big Bend Open Road Race in Texas with his 2019 Corvette ZR1. Not only did he take home the record, but he also cooked ...
titleSummary: "Corvette's Red-Hot ZR1 Leaves Burnt Rubber in its Wake at Extreme Racing Session"
descriptionSummary: A Texas driver made headlines at the Big Bend Open Road Race by shattering the speed record in a 2019 Corvette ZR1, but his achievement was overshadowed by an unfortunate side effect: the car's engine caught fire.

title: 2026 Honda Civic is a Little Pricier—Should You Get a 2025 Instead?
description: The Honda Accord may be losing its popularity to Americans, but the Civic is still one of the automaker's best-selling models. For 2026, the Civic lineup sees a minor price bump, but with 2025 models still sitting in dealer inventory, the decision isn’t as easy as it seems. With the 2026 Civic ...
titleSummary: "Civic Conundrum: Should You Opt for Last Year's Model Amid Price Hikes?"
descriptionSummary: Despite the Honda Accord's waning popularity among Americans, the Civic remains a top seller for the automaker. For 2026, prices are slightly higher, but lingering 2025 models on dealership lots complicate the buying decision.

title: Toyota Reveals When The GR Supra Goes To The Grave
description: It's finally happened. After Toyota revealed Final Edition variants of the GR Supra for various markets earlier this year, teasing the end of the A90's lifecycle, the automaker has now issued a statement confirming when exactly the Supra will be put to pasture. It's short enough for us to include ...

descriptionSummary: Toyota has officially confirmed the production timeline for its current GR Supra model. The final edition variants that appeared earlier this year hinted at an impending conclusion to the A90's lifespan, and now we have a definitive end date in sight.

title: WATCH: How the Toyota Land Cruiser FJ Transforms From City Brawler to Off-Roader
description: The Toyota Land Cruiser FJ has finally arrived – at least in prototype form. descriptionSummary: The highly anticipated Toyota Land Cruiser FJ has made a digital appearance in Japan, previewing what's to come at the Japan Mobility Show. Its actual debut can't arrive soon enough - stay tuned for our hands-on review when it finally hits the metal.

title: From Fire to Fury: The Koenigsegg Jesko Nür Revenge Rises From the Ashes
description: There’s something poetic about machines that refuse to die. Especially when they’re built by Koenigsegg. descriptionSummary: A phoenix from the ashes, literally: witness the resilience of Koenigsegg machines, like the one that became an unlikely viral sensation after a catastrophic fire on a Greek highway in 2024.

title: Tesla’s Latest Recall Accidentally Reveals How Many Cybertrucks Exist
description: Tesla doesn't publicly list sales data for the Cybertruck, but thanks to a new recall issued by the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration, we may now have a rough idea of how many have been sold since the vehicle went on sale at the end of 2023. title: 2004 Porsche 911 GT3 For Sale With 8,000 Miles: Sports Car Perfection For Mustang Money
description: If you want a new 911 GT3, not only do you need at least $230,500, but you also need to have a close relationship with your local Porsche dealer, and that is only fostered through years of buying other, "lesser" Porsches. The alternative? Buy one that isn't brand new, like this 2004 example with ...

descriptionSummary: Porsche enthusiasts willing to splurge on the coveted 911 GT3 will need a substantial bankroll – at least $230,500 – and a well-established connection with their local dealership, often built over years of purchasing other Porsche models. Alternatively, consider a pre-owned model like this 2004 example.

title: Sung Kang Returns to the Big Screen with a V8-Powered Toyota AE86
description: Actor and filmmaker Sung Kang, best known for his role as Han Lue in the Fast and Furious franchise, is returning to the world of high-performance cars with his latest project, Drifter. descriptionSummary: Sung Kang, star of the Fast and Furious series, is revving up the engine on his new passion project, Drifter. This gritty drama combines high-stakes racing with a poignant tale of belonging and redemption, showcasing Kang's growing talent as a filmmaker.

title: A Different Kind of Hyundai Santa Fe is Coming to North America
description: Hyundai’s fifth-generation Santa Fe hasn’t been around for long, but the brand is already working on a facelifted version. title: How a Stolen Dodge Hellcat Redeye Took Down an Alabama Chop Shop
description: When police started looking into the theft of a Dodge Challenger SRT Hellcat Redeye from Hendersonville, Tennessee, in late September, they had no idea it would lead them across state lines, let alone bust a co-ordinated criminal enterprise. titleSummary: "Hyundai Unveils Compact Crossover Challenger to Chevrolet's Trax in Global Market"
descriptionSummary: Hyundai's compact Venue crossover has undergone significant changes, and a completely revamped model has just been unveiled online, hinting at an updated U.S. lineup set to debut as a 2027 model.

title: Americans Are Warming Up to Chinese Cars — Even If They Can’t Buy Them Yet
description: Chinese automakers still can’t sell directly in the United States, but that isn’t stopping Americans from noticing them. descriptionSummary: Chinese automakers may not have direct sales in the US market yet, but their presence is gaining traction among American consumers. A recent study reveals that nearly two-thirds of US drivers are now familiar with at least one Chinese car brand.

title: Former Stellantis CEO Carlos Tavares Has a Shocking Prediction for Automaker

descriptionSummary: A top executive's candid assessment has sparked concern over the future of Stellantis, a multinational auto giant with diverse global interests. Carlos Tavares' provocative comments hint at a possible fragmentation of the company's far-reaching business empire.

title: 2026 Toyota Sienna Gets Better Features—But is the 2025 Model a Smarter Buy?
description: Minivans are experiencing a bit of a resurgence in the United States this year, and the Toyota Sienna is one of the beneficiaries. descriptionSummary: The minivan market is seeing a notable comeback in the US this year, and Toyota's Sienna is riding high on the trend. With sales already surged by nearly 50% so far in 2025, it's poised to maintain momentum with enhanced features coming for the 2026 model.

title: Alfa Romeo’s Next Gamble: Staying Small to Survive
description: Alfa Romeo just got a big investment, but things aren't going well. descriptionSummary: Alfa Romeo has secured a significant investment, but its fortunes remain uncertain. Despite introducing a cutting-edge billion-euro platform, sales have been sluggish, and the brand's flagship models haven't yet achieved commercial success as expected.

title: Mitsubishi’s Cheapest SUV Is About to Get Even Cheaper
description: With the discontinuation of the Mirage and Mirage G4, Mitsubishi is reportedly planning to reposition the Outlander Sport as a more affordable entry point into its U.S. lineup. The compact SUV currently starts around $24,000, but according to Automotive News, insiders suggest a ...

descriptionSummary: Mitsubishi is poised to revamp its US market strategy by shifting focus to the Outlander Sport as an accessible gateway for budget-conscious buyers, potentially pricing it even lower than its current starting point of around $24,000.

title: SPIED: The Hybrid C63 Won't Be The Most Hated AMG Much Longer
description: The current Mercedes-AMG C 63 is powered by a 2.0-liter turbocharged four-cylinder hybrid. There are several terms in that powertrain description that have rubbed buyers the wrong way, so much so that Mercedes is reportedly considering backtracking on the decision with either a straight-six engine ...

descriptionSummary: Mercedes-AMG's C 63 has faced pushback over its current configuration, which features a turbocharged four-cylinder hybrid. In response, the manufacturer is rumored to be revisiting its powertrain strategy, potentially opting for a more traditional inline-six motor.

title: GM’s Dream Cars Gone in Flames, Including the 2026 Camaro?
description: A massive fire has torn through GM’s Advanced Design Center in California, potentially reducing some of the company’s most confidential designs to ashes. titleSummary: "Fiat Fiery Fate: High-Tech Concepts Incinerated, Leaving 2026 Camaro's Future Ashes"
descriptionSummary: A catastrophic blaze swept through General Motors' elite design studio in California, threatening to incinerate sensitive blueprints for the automaker's most innovative future projects. This hub of creative genius was where groundbreaking ideas came to life.

title: Kia Already Planning to Redesign its First Pickup Truck
description: When Kia launched the Tasman, it became the Korean brand's first real attempt at building a truck designed for personal and recreational use, not just a small commercial vehicle—a real headline-maker that grabbed attention worldwide. descriptionSummary: Kia's Tasman marked a significant shift in the brand's truck strategy, transitioning from utilitarian workhorses to rugged vehicles designed for personal adventures and leisurely pursuits, sparking global interest with its bold, eye-catching aesthetic.

title: GM to Drop Apple CarPlay and Android Auto from All Vehicles
description: General Motors has confirmed it plans to remove Apple CarPlay and Android Auto from all future vehicles, expanding a controversial decision that previously applied only to its EV lineup. In an interview with The Verge, CEO Mary Barra said the move will eventually cover the company’s entire ...

descriptionSummary: General Motors is set to drop Apple CarPlay and Android Auto integration from all new vehicles, building on a previous decision that initially targeted its electric vehicle lineup, according to comments made by CEO Mary Barra.

title: Toyota RAV4 PHEV’s Fast Charging Limited To Two Trims—Here’s Why
description: We just had the opportunity to get the wheel of the all-new 2026 Toyota RAV4, which is particularly quick in plug-in hybrid form. descriptionSummary: We took the wheel of the all-new Toyota RAV4, with its plug-in hybrid variant boasting impressive acceleration - a whopping 324 horsepower, outpacing its competitors. But what's just as exciting is its compatibility with high-speed charging technology.

title: Manual-Swapped 2006 Lamborghini Murciélago Roadster For Sale With 19,900 Miles
description: The Murciélago was never meant to be tame. Named after a legendary fighting bull that survived 24 sword strokes, this Lamborghini embodies defiance. descriptionSummary: Meet the Murciélago, a Lamborghini born from rebellion. Inspired by an unyielding bull, this beast of a car unleashes a raw, 6.2-liter V12 roar that echoes through the ages. A manual transmission only adds to its untamed spirit.

title: Volkswagen Halts Golf Production Amid Chip Shortage
description: The semiconductor shortage turmoil has again threatened to disrupt the automotive sector, as Volkswagen has already warned its employees of production disruptions at major plants. The reason for this recent chip crisis is due to recent geopolitical tensions between the Netherlands and China over ...

title: Soaring Tariffs Are About to Hit Car Buyers Hard
description: The third quarter was rough for General Motors, and likely won’t look much better for the rest of the industry, analysts warn. The biggest of the Detroit automakers saw earnings fall by half, partially the result of a shifting strategy on EVs, but also due to the cost of tariffs. Collectively, ...
titleSummary: "New Trade Barriers Threaten to Slam Brakes on US Auto Sales"
descriptionSummary: General Motors struggled in Q3, and experts predict a similar challenging outlook for the rest of the industry. Earnings plunged 50% for the Detroit giant, driven by a pivot towards electric vehicles and rising tariff costs.

title: We Love Japan's Punishment for Hit-and-Run Drivers
description: Imagine stepping out for a short errand and returning to your car only to see a big, glaring dent. Ah, the classic hit-and-run. An insurance claim for the repair would help, sure, but the fact remains: someone broke the law and left. No note, no witnesses. In Japan, the offender wouldn't be getting ...
titleSummary: "Tough Justice in Tokyo: Japan Gets Tough on Reckless Road Users"
descriptionSummary: A routine errand turns into a frustrating discovery when you return to find your car sporting a mysterious dent. The culprit is likely long gone, leaving behind only damage and unanswered questions about their intentions.

title: Three Classic Bentley Sedans Reborn as Bespoke Flying Spurs
description: The Bentley Bentayga SUV may be the British automaker’s best-selling current model, but there’s still something especially dignified about pulling up to your destination in a classic Bentley sedan. descriptionSummary: For those seeking refined luxury, a classic Bentley sedan is hard to beat, evoking timeless elegance and sophistication wherever it goes. In tribute, Bentley's latest celebration showcases three iconic sedans that have shaped the brand's heritage.

descriptionSummary: The 80-series Toyota Land Cruiser boasts impressive off-road prowess, thanks in part to its potent 1FZ-FE inline-six engine. This stalwart powerplant, introduced in the early 1990s, set a new standard for performance and refinement in the rugged SUV.

title: Jeep’s New Recon EV Launches This Spring — But the CEO Admits It May Struggle to Find Buyers
description: The Jeep Recon has been one of the most anticipated cars on our radar for some time now. descriptionSummary: The highly anticipated Jeep Recon has generated significant buzz, thanks in part to its distinctive design and competitive pricing, which makes it an attractive option compared to other EV offerings from the brand.

title: “An All-Electric Corvette That Feels Like a Corvette Is Not Easy Right Now,” Says GM President

descriptionSummary: GM is rapidly expanding its electrified lineup with plug-in options available across several popular SUVs and crossovers, including the Escalade IQ. This shift aims to significantly reduce carbon footprint and emissions.

title: Nissan's Newest EV Doesn't Need Charging – Will It Reach Production?
description: With the advent of EVs, the idea of running partly on solar power has been around for decades. There have been prototypes, concept cars, and even a few small-scale projects, but no major automaker has ever fully committed to putting one into production. descriptionSummary: Electric vehicles have long sparked interest in harnessing solar energy on the go. While early concepts and test runs existed, mass-market implementation has remained elusive due to numerous technological hurdles.

title: European Cities Warn That Accepting US Car Standards Will Risk European Lives

descriptionSummary: A coalition of government representatives from major European cities and over 75 regional non-profits has sounded the alarm to EU officials, urging them to re-examine key policies affecting the continent's future.

title: Free EV Charging at Home? Volvo’s Big New Perk Starts in Sweden
description: Volvo Cars is giving Swedish buyers of its fully electric models a reason to plug in at home. Beginning February 2026, the automaker will offer one year of free home charging through a partnership with energy supplier Vattenfall. The program grants customers up to 5,150 ...

descriptionSummary: Volvo is launching a new initiative for Swedish buyers of its electric vehicles, providing one year of complimentary home charging through a collaboration with energy provider Vattenfall, starting in February 2026.

title: VW Pauses ID. Buzz Production Amid Weak Sales and $60K Price Tag
description: Volkswagen’s retro-inspired ID. Buzz set out to revive the spirit of the Microbus for the electric age. It’s stylish, practical, and packed with personality. titleSummary: Volkswagen Halts ID. Buzz Output Due to Soft Demand and Premium Pricing
descriptionSummary: Volkswagen's nostalgic ID. Buzz aimed to breathe new life into the iconic Microbus for the electric era, blending style and practicality with a dash of personality. However, nearly 12 months after its debut, enthusiasm has begun to wane. Production of the ID. Buzz has been temporarily halted at Volkswagen's Hanover facility in Germany.

title: Porsche Working on Radical New W18 Engine With Three Banks of Cylinders
description: Just a few days after we reported on Porsche’s patent detailing the application of electrically-assisted twin turbos to combat flow stall, the German Patent and Trade Mark Office (DPMA) has disclosed another Porsche patent, this time describing a unique W18 motor. titleSummary: "Revolutionary Road: Porsche Unveils Groundbreaking 18-Cylinder Engine with Triple Power Sources"

title: GM Doesn't Want You To Drive Its Cars - Eyes-Off Driving and a New AI Assistant Are Coming Soon
